title: Audit Cloud Cost Management (FinOps)
description: An IT auditor reviews the company's management of its cloud computing costs.

tasks.description: Analyze the detailed cloud billing data for the last 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the complete cloud spend data.

tasks.description: Identify 'zombie' resources, such as unattached storage volumes or idle virtual machines, that are incurring costs but not being used.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies a significant amount of monthly spend on unused resources.

tasks.description: Recommend the implementation of an automated process to identify and decommission unused cloud resources.
tasks.expected_outcome: A recommendation is made to improve cloud cost governance.
